forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mixed clouds and sun with scattered thunderstorms. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mixed clouds and sun with scattered thunderstorms. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
